basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: Word of Lu Bu's skill spread far and wide, and he sparred with generals before the Emperor, but never once was he defeated. Impressed, the Emperor declared him unrivaled and ordered him to guard the canyon.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: 30% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 225% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Adds Effect: 60% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 295% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - 60% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 19s]
 - Allies (Attack, Universal)
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 350% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 60% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase [Increases by: 19s].
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Attack, Universal Allies
 - Adds Effect: 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 100% HP upon falling in battle. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Grants All Debuff Immunity upon revival. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Damage Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - All Allies
 - Adds Effect: 24% Damage Boost. [Always Active]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Attack, Universal Allies
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification upon revival. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Word of Lu Bu's skill spread far and wide, and he sparred with generals before the Emperor, but never once was he defeated. Impressed, the Emperor declared him unrivaled and ordered him to guard the canyon.

basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: When Lu Bu learned that the officials he had once served and protected were oppressing the people and committing atrocities, he was enraged and took justice into his own hands.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 175% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 3 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 73% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Allies (Attack, Universal)
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 70% HP upon falling in battle. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Grants All Debuff Immunity upon revival. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

profile.story: When Lu Bu learned that the officials he had once served and protected were oppressing the people and committing atrocities, he was enraged and took justice into his own hands.

basicInfo.name: Lu Bu
basicInfo.flavor: An orphan with no family to call his own, Lu Bu grew up stealing and fighting on the streets. One day, he caught the eye of a local official and was taken in, eventually rising as a soldier.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 150% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 73% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 200% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Allies (Attack, Universal)
 - Grants Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 50% HP upon falling in battle. [2 Time(s) per Battle]
 - Grants All Debuff Immunity upon revival. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

profile.story: An orphan with no family to call his own, Lu Bu grew up stealing and fighting on the streets. One day, he caught the eye of a local official and was taken in, eventually rising as a soldier.
